Romania $\mathbf{+}$ appointment( Da Dabi Global Solutions )  

Price : 1750 euro  750 euro  advance payment 1000 euro after date of appointment .  

Document production time : 3 months $^+$ appointment 1 month Valid documents  : 1 year $^+$ TRC  

Documents for submission:  

$\bullet$ Scanned copy of passport $\bullet$ Resume (will be an advantage)  

●​ PСС (when the candidate will apply at the embassy, ​have it with you)   
​ Medical insurance (when the candidate will apply at the embassy, ​have it with you)  

Vacancy :  

1.​ Couriers ( drivers licence must have  ) GLOVO.  

$\bullet$ accommodation - free . 4 person in flat ( 4 rooms ) $\bullet$ meals - 1 time per day -free  

Salary 500-700 euro netto  

2.​Worker in Supermarket Auchan ●​ accommodation - free ( where they will be working )  

3.​Worker in Supermarket Metro $\bullet$ accomodation - free  

Salary 600-800 euro netto
